definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: usu. pleasantness (so Thes amoenitas), but perh. epithet of Adonis (so Mo:Phoen. i. 227 Lag:Symm. i. 468; Semit. i. 32 who cp. red flower called 4q0yq 0ln9m0n [v. Lane:1578], i.e. wound of Adonis, whence a)nemw/h; cf. Ew: Proph. i. 364 RS:Proph. vi. n. 10 and v. Lewy:Fremdwörter, 49);—only pl. [[נִטְעֵי נַעֲמָנִים]] Is 17:10 (LXX fu/teuma a)/piston ) perh. = Adonis-plantations, or gardens (on double pl. v. Ges:§ 124 q; and on )Adw/nidov\ kh=pWi\ v. Rochette:Rev. Archêol. viii. 1851, 105 – 123 Daremberg et Saglio:Dict. des Antiquitês (1877), i. 73, and reff. WSmith:Dict. Antiq. (3) i. 25 Fl in Levy:NHWB iv. 229).
